评论详情: Did not receive anything close to what is described. No stars, only holes. Much smaller than expected as well. Very cheap, low quality fabric. Only saving grace was amazing Amazon customer service! but stay away from this product.

I ordered this for my daughter. The first was delivered with no button hole to secure the waistline.  Amazon helpfully offered to replace the defective item. The replacement arrived, also defective. Please don't bother.
